articles.author: KELVIN CHAN
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — European regulators slapped TikTok with a $368 million fine on Friday for failing to protect children's privacy, the first time that the popular short video-sharing app has been punished for breaching Europe's strict data privacy rules.
articles.title: TikTok is hit with $368 million fine under Europe's strict data privacy rules

articles.author: TOM KRISHER, COREY WILLIAMS and MIKE HOUSEHOLDER
articles.description: DETROIT (AP) — About 13,000 U.S. auto workers stopped making vehicles and went on strike Friday after their leaders couldn’t bridge a giant gap between union demands in contract talks and what Detroit’s three automakers are willing to pay.
articles.title: Workers are on strike at all 3 Detroit auto makers for the first time in their union's history

articles.author: YOUSEF MOURAD
articles.description: DERNA, Libya (AP) — Libyan authorities evacuated residents from an inundated city Friday and limited access to it, as searchers dug through mud and hollowed-out buildings for 10,000 people missing and feared dead in flooding that has already killed more than 11,000.
articles.title: Libya evacuates flooded city as searchers look for 10,000 missing after death toll passes 11,000

articles.author: DAVID SHARP and PATRICK WHITTLE
articles.description: PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — After a deluge of rain, flooding, sinkholes and tornadoes this week, New England is about to face Hurricane Lee.
articles.title: Hurricane Lee to strike weather-worn New England after heavy rain, flooding and tornadoes

articles.author: HYUNG-JIN KIM, KIM TONG-HYUNG and EMMA BURROWS
articles.description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — North Korean leader Kim Jong Un peered into the cockpit of Russia’s most advanced fighter jet as he toured an aircraft factory Friday on an extended trip that has raised concerns about banned weapons transfer deals between the increasingly isolated countries.
articles.title: North Korea's Kim gets a close look at Russian fighter jets as his tour narrows its focus to weapons

articles.author: SAMYA KULLAB
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Ukraine's forces have recaptured a village in the country’s east after intense battles with Russian troops, the military said Friday as the invaded nation pursues a multi-pronged counteroffensive.
articles.title: Ukrainian forces reclaim a village in the east as part of counteroffensive

articles.author: LINDSAY WHITEHURST
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Hunter Biden was indicted Thursday on federal firearms charges, the latest step in a long-running investigation into the president's son that puts the case on track toward a possible high-stakes trial as the 2024 election looms.
articles.title: Hunter Biden is indicted on federal firearm-purchasing charges after plea deal fails

articles.author: SEUNG MIN KIM and LINLEY SANDERS
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden is trumpeting Medicare's new powers to negotiate directly with drugmakers on the cost of prescription medications — but a poll shows that any immediate political boost that Biden gets for enacting the overwhelmingly popular policy may be limited.
articles.title: Americans overwhelmingly support Medicare drug negotiations, but Biden sees little political boost

articles.author: KELVIN CHAN
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — European regulators slapped TikTok with a $368 million fine on Friday for failing to protect children's privacy, the first time that the popular short video-sharing app has been punished for breaching Europe's strict data privacy rules.
articles.title: TikTok is hit with $368 million fine under Europe's strict data privacy rules

articles.author: ANDREW SELSKY
articles.description: EUGENE, Ore. (AP) — Psilocybin tea, wind chimes and a tie-dye mattress await those coming to an office suite in Eugene to trip on magic mushrooms. For roughly six hours, adults over 21 can experience what many users describe as vivid geometric shapes, a loss of identity and a oneness with the universe.
articles.title: Thousands sign up to experience magic mushrooms as Oregon's novel psilocybin experiment takes off
